analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x33d9eb04442b7711cec632384df6bba45b141d3a.sol:
	Contract SparkleAirDrop has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x33d9eb04442b7711cec632384df6bba45b141d3a.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

AirDropWinners.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x33d9eb04442b7711cec632384df6bba45b141d3a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(tokenAddress).transfer(msg.sender,tempPendingTokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x33d9eb04442b7711cec632384df6bba45b141d3a.sol)
